meanings.definition: A part or element of a larger whole.
meanings.sent1: The engine is a crucial component of the car.
meanings.sent2: The wheels are an important component of a bicycle.
meanings.sent3: The missing component of the recipe was the secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a key component in brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the window was a vital component of the morning.

meanings.definition: A constituent part or aspect of something.
meanings.sent1: The flour is a necessary component for baking a cake.
meanings.sent2: The characters are a vital component of a good story.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected plot twist became a surprising component of the movie.
meanings.sent4: His dedication was a fundamental component in achieving success.
meanings.sent5: The melody played by the violin was a beautiful component of the symphony.
